description: I have tried to install this and it just will not start up. Says that it installs but when you try to start it up all I get is a bouncing icon on the screen and after that nothing. Have tried to start this on X11 and Wayland but it just won't go.

Well, the title would be longer if I could but that's it, for those who the program doesn't open just install the flatpak version and that's it. This is "fixed" because the flatpak version comes with all its dependencies, and at least in my case the Ubuntu repositories version is missing two dependencies: "kirigami. addons" and "QtWebChannel", the first one is easily installable using Synaptic and the second one simply does not exist, I looked for it with all possible names and installed several meta packages with that name and it still does not open, and now I have about 20 meta packages that I did not need flooding my system and I can not uninstall because it breaks programs like Kalendar...

That aside, the program works fine, many thanks to the developers and the interface is beautiful. 

I hope the dev reads this because without a KDE account I can't comment on the program's Issues, but I'm not sure if it's a bug or what but the program does NOT remember the last book position when exiting and re-entering. I have to manually note which was the last page (which it doesn't say either, it just gives a percentage at the bottom).

I also want to report that there is some inresponsiveness when changing the page using the bottom bar, and when resizing the window, since the content is deformed and you have to reopen it to correct.

I know it's only version 1.0.1 but please fix those things, I know that the dependencies problem is not the dev's fault, but please add an bookmark option, it's stressful to have to manually go to the last position.
summary: For those who have problems with the app not opening, install flatpak
